scripts.build-demo: cd demo && rm -rf dist && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy-demo-static: mkdir -p demo/dist && cp -r dist/static demo/dist/static && find demo/dist/static/models ! -name 'ggml-tiny.en.bin' -type f -exec rm -f {} +
scripts.deploy: npm run build-demo && npm run copy-demo-static && gh-pages -d demo/dist
